latestInspection.result: Inspection Result:     Compliance Inspection of Open Violations - Previously cited violations corrected

infractions.Violation Summary: At time of inspection toxic substances observed improperly stored so as to result in the potential for exposure or contamination of facility surfaces
infractions.Category: Violations requiring correction within two weeks Critical Violations

infractions.Violation Summary: At time of inspection inside temperature of between 68 deg F and 72 deg F was not maintained when outside temperature registered below 55 deg F

infractions.Violation Summary: At time of inspection it was determined that child care service failed to conduct and document monthly fire drills
infractions.Category: Violations requiring correction within two weeks Critical Violations

infractions.Violation Summary: At the time of inspection child care service was observed providing hair brushes and cloth towels for use by children
